records.location_details: The incident occurred near the Albania-Montenegro border, close to a railroad, with GPS coordinates [redacted] as identified by the migrants. Migrants were walking along a railroad near the Albania-Montenegro border when they were stopped. This location is consistent with other similar incidents in the North-western Albania, near the Albania-Montenegro border, within approximately 2.5 km of each other.
records.where_clear: Along a railroad near the Albania-Montenegro border in North-western Albania.
records.location_text_raw: along a railroad near the Albania-Montenegro border
records.uncertainty_note: GPS coordinates were identified by migrants but are redacted in the document.

possible_violations.legal_basis: [Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 of the European Convention on Human Rights (ECHR)]

records.context_note: Six migrants were allegedly robbed of 150â‚¬ each by three men in Albanian police uniforms near the Albania-Montenegro border. The incident occurred around midnight on 16/08/2024. The Fundamental Rights Office assesses the migrants' accounts as credible and notes similarities with other incidents in the area, suggesting a pattern of exploitation. Albanian authorities' investigation did not confirm police involvement but the possibility of off-duty officers or civilians dressed as police is considered.
records.evidence_quote: The Fundamental Rights Office received information from Frontex operational staff about six migrants who alleged being robbed by three men in Albanian police uniforms on 16/08/2024... while walking along a railroad near the Albania-Montenegro border.
